job.command:
starver SL15c
setenv EDAY `perl $STAR/StRoot/macros/embedding/getYearDayFromFile.pl -d ${FILEBASENAME}` setenv ERUN `perl $STAR/StRoot/macros/embedding/getYearDayFromFile.pl -r ${FILEBASENAME}` setenv EOUTDIR '/path/to/your/directory/production/'$EDAY'/'$ERUN setenv ELOGDIR '/path/to/your/directory/log/'$EDAY'/'$ERUN echo $EOUTDIR echo $ELOGDIR
if ( ! -f $EOUTDIR ) then mkdir -pv $EOUTDIR chmod -R g+rw $EOUTDIR endif
if ( ! -f $ELOGDIR ) then mkdir -pv $ELOGDIR chmod -R g+rw $ELOGDIR endif
root4star -q -b -l StRoot/macros/runPicoD0AnaMaker.C\(\"$FILELIST\",\"$JOBID.root\"\) >& ${JOBID}.log tar -zcvf ${JOBID}.log.tgz ${JOBID}.log
